name: In The Beginning (itch) (Blueman)
description:
Create the world piece by piece.

--== TIPS ==--

* The Sin Meter represents your percentage change to draw a sin card (red card) as opposed to a resource card (green card) or item card (blue card)

* Playing an advancement card (black card) will cut your sin in half and reset the amount of sin gained by drawing a card

Made for Ludum Dare 45
